title: aria-placeholder attribute
description: Defines a short hint (a word or short phrase) intended to aid the user with data entry when the control has no value. A hint could be a sample value or a brief description of the expected format.

assertions.title: convey placeholder when unpopulated
examples: Screen readers announce the placeholder when a labelled, empty text field receives focus

assertions.title: contribute to the accessible name
examples: Screen readers use the placeholder as the field name when no other labelling method is applied
Speech interfaces can use the placeholder to identify / activate a field when no other labelling method is applied
